;;;;;;Addr=0x  Val=0x Repeat=0d Skip=0x
;;;;
;; NOTE: the values came from Cider, but 'formula's where manually managed
;;
06e40000 14a00000
;;0x02000010 + n*0x1000: where n (0-27) represents Port
02000010 1fffe0         28      1000
;;0x02000010 + n*0x1000: where n (63-63) represents CPU
0203f010 1fffe0
;;0x02000300 + n*0x4: where n (0-3) represents Register
02000300 5f205f2        4       4
02040000 69030011
02040008 00003fff
0204000c 0000803f
02040010 52103210
020400a8 00000ffe
02040140 04d85f41
02040144 00000027
;;0x010000F0 + 4*i: where i (0-1) represents index
010000f0 ffffffff       2       4
;;0x01000300 + i*4: where i (0-3) represents VLAN_Ethertype_index
01000300 81008100       4       4
;;0x01000310 + n*4: where n (0-31) represents Port
01000310 ffffffff       32      4
;;0x01001600 + n*0x10: where n (0-7) represents Number of MAC
01001600 fff0           8       10
;;0x01001608 + n*0x10: where n (0-7) represents Number of MAC
01001608 fffffff0       8       10
;;0x0100160C + n*0x10: where n (0-7) represents Number of MAC
0100160c ffffffff       8       10

;;0x01810060 + 0x4*n: where n (0-1) represents Port div 32
01810060 ffffffff       2       4
;;0x0A0A0010 + n * 0x4: where n (0-63) represents Port
0a0a0010 ff             64      4
;;0x0A0A0220 + t*0x4: where t (0-7) represents TC
0a0a0220 ffff           8       4
;;0x0A0A0320 + 0x4*n: where n (0-7) represents profile
0a0a0320 a0019          8       4
;;0x0A0A0400 + t*0x4: where t (0-7) represents TC
0a0a0400 af0300         8       4
;;0x0A0B0900 + 0x20*p + 0x4*t: where p (0-7) represents profile, where t (0-7) represents tc

;;0x11001200 + p*0x10: where p (0-3) represents Profile
11001200 ff             4       10
;;0x11001200 + 0xEC0+(p-4)*0x10: where p (4-7) represents Profile
110020c0 ff             4       10
;;0x11001400 + 4*n: where n (0-2) represents Port div 10
11001400 9249249        3       4
;;0x11002014 + n * 0x4: where n (0-15) represents Port

;; start cpu port
0a80fc00        00008be5
0a80fc04        00000003
0a80fc08        0000c048
0a80fc0c        0000bbe8
0a80fc14        000008d2
0a80fc18        0000d5cd
0a80fc1c        00000052

0a80fc2c        0000000c

0a80fc34        0000a000

;; end cpu port
;;;;;;;;;;;; manually added ;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;; set Ports VLAN QoS and Protocol Configuration Tables
;; bits 15..26 PVID = 1
;;0x01001000 +p*0x10: where p (0-27,63) represents Port
01001000 8000     28               10
010013f0 8000     1                0
;; TTI internal register
01000204        0000000c
;; SST memory (32 sets of 2 registers = 64 registers)
01810500        ffffffff        64      4
;; VIDX 0xFFF (bmp of all ports)
1186fff0        0fff0fff        2       4
;; Statistical Rate Limits Table Entry<n>
0b100000        ffffffff        32      4
;; TCAM Entry<n> ControlX Word, bit 17 - Entry Spare bit. Should be set to 1. (3K entries)
0d040004        00020000 3072 0x40
;; TCAM Entry<n> ControlY Word, bit 17 - Entry Spare bit. Should be set to 1. (3K entries)
0d040024        00020000 3072 0x40
;; Ingress_Vlan_Table - vlan 1
;; set bits 0..64 , 98 , 104..115
118A0020        ffffffff        2       4
118A0028        00000001
118A002c        000fff04
;; Egress_Vlan_Table - vlan 1
;; set bits 0..63
11800040        ffffffff        2       4
;; designated trunk table (64 entries of 2 words)
01810200        ffffffff        128     4
;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;;
;; Buffer Management
03000000        8FC7F8FF
03000004        1FC7F8FF
03000020        02807007
03000024        0A024825
;; last line
ffffffff
